languages.text: "А как иначе — вершит правосудие. Но потом он{rt_mf||а} щедро одарил{rt_mf||а} семьи всех, кто кормильца потерял, — им теперь до конца жизни пальца поднимать не надо".

traits.locale_text: "А как иначе — вершит правосудие. Но потом он{rt_mf||а} щедро одарил{rt_mf||а} семьи всех, кто кормильца потерял, — им теперь до конца жизни пальца поднимать не надо".

languages.text: "It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."
languages.original_text: "А как иначе — вершит правосудие. Но потом он{rt_mf||а} щедро одарил{rt_mf||а} семьи всех, кто кормильца потерял, — им теперь до конца жизни пальца поднимать не надо".

traits.locale_text: "What a bunch of lies! I've heard {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the executed man's family for the loss of their provider. They don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."
"What a bunch of lies! I've heard {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the executed man's family for the loss of their provider. They don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."
"What a bunch of lies! I heard {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the executed man's family for the loss of their provider. They don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."
"What a bunch of lies! I heard {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the executed man's family for the loss of their provider. They don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

"It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

"It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

languages.text: “当时的情况只能这样，因为正义必须得到伸张。但随后，那位大人慷慨地补偿了那些失去支柱的家庭。如今，那些人的家人一辈子都不用干活了。”
languages.original_text: "It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

traits.locale_text: “当时的情况只能这样，因为正义必须得到伸张。但随后，那位大人慷慨地补偿了那些失去支柱的家庭。如今，那些人的家人一辈子都不用干活了。”

languages.text: «Era lo correcto: tenía que hacer justicia. Pero después compensó generosamente a las familias que habían perdido a sus proveedores. No tendrán que trabajar el resto de sus vidas».
languages.original_text: "It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

traits.locale_text: «Era lo correcto: tenía que hacer justicia. Pero después compensó generosamente a las familias que habían perdido a sus proveedores. No tendrán que trabajar el resto de sus vidas».

languages.text: "Doğru olanı yaptı. Adaletin yerini bulması gerekiyordu. Fakat sonra geçimini sağlayanları kaybeden herkesin ailesine cömertçe tazminat ödedi. Şimdi hayatlarının geri kalanında parmaklarını kıpırdatmalarına gerek kalmayacak."
languages.original_text: "It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

traits.locale_text: "Doğru olanı yaptı. Adaletin yerini bulması gerekiyordu. Fakat sonra geçimini sağlayanları kaybeden herkesin ailesine cömertçe tazminat ödedi. Şimdi hayatlarının geri kalanında parmaklarını kıpırdatmalarına gerek kalmayacak."

languages.text: 「まさにその通りで、正義が執行されたよ。しかし、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は寛大にも一家の大黒柱を失ったすべての家族に補償をしたんだ。今では、彼らは残りの人生で指一本動かす必要がないんだ」
languages.original_text: "It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

traits.locale_text: 「まさにその通りで、正義が執行されたよ。しかし、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は寛大にも一家の大黒柱を失ったすべての家族に補償をしたんだ。今では、彼らは残りの人生で指一本動かす必要がないんだ」

languages.text: « Ce n'était que justice. Mais {rt_mf|il|elle} a généreusement dédommagé leurs familles. Elles n'auront plus à lever le petit doigt jusqu'à la fin de leur vie. »
languages.original_text: "It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était que justice. Mais {rt_mf|il|elle} a généreusement dédommagé leurs familles. Elles n'auront plus à lever le petit doigt jusqu'à la fin de leur vie. »

languages.text: "Das war auch gut so ... schließlich musste der Gerechtigkeit Genüge getan werden. Aber dann hat {rt_mf|er|sie} all die Familien entschädigt, die ihre Versorger verloren hatten. Jetzt müssen sie den Rest ihres Lebens keinen Finger mehr rühren."
languages.original_text: "It was only right — justice had to be served. But then, {rt_mf|he|she} generously compensated the families of all who had lost their providers. Now they don't have to lift a finger for the rest of their lives."

traits.locale_text: "Das war auch gut so ... schließlich musste der Gerechtigkeit Genüge getan werden. Aber dann hat {rt_mf|er|sie} all die Familien entschädigt, die ihre Versorger verloren hatten. Jetzt müssen sie den Rest ihres Lebens keinen Finger mehr rühren."
